dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4365184L] re: Urgent! Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________ From: Papachristos, Stacy [mailto:Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 10:07 AM To: Copyright Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4365184L] re: Urgent! Notice of Infringement June 1, 2007 By Email Re: Unauthorized Use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc. Intellectual Property To Whom It May Concern: World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc., and its subsidiaries WWE Libraries, Inc. and WCW, Inc. (collectively referred to as "WWE") are the exclusive owners of numerous trademarks, service marks, and copyrights, including numerous copyrights for various WWE, WCW, CSW, WCCW, OVW, CWF, ECW, AWA American Wrestling Association, NWA, and Smoky Mountain video footage (hereinafter collectively referred to as "WWE Footage"). As owner of numerous copyrights for WWE Footage, we vigilantly protect our copyrighted works and will not tolerate any infringement of the same. Since your company is listed as the hosting company of the www.wrestlenewz.com website, we are writing to inform you that you are infringing upon WWE copyrights. As such, we demand that you immediately cease and desist from using this website to directly or indirectly cause, enable, induce, contribute to, encourage, facilitate, and/or participate in the infringement of WWE copyrighted works. In particular, we demand that you immediately stop distributing, posting and/or streaming WWE Footage/images, and all activities that contribute to the infringement of WWE intellectual property, including but not limited to providing links to material that you know is infringing, on your www.wrestlenewz.com website. For your reference, attached is a sampling of WWE copyrighted works that are being infringed. Please note that this is only a sampling of WWE material that is being infringed and is not intended to suggest that the identified infringements are the only ones occurring. ALL WWE Footage and copyrighted images must be removed from the www.wrestlenewz.com website and any links to content which is infringing must be removed from your www.wrestlenewz.com website immediately. Otherwise we will be forced to take further legal action. I have good faith to believe that use of the material identified above in the manner complained of above is not authorized by the WWE, its agent, or the law. The information in this notification is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, I am authorized to act on behalf of WWE. The demands made herein are not made to the exclusion of other remedies to which WWE is entitled and WWE specifically reserves the right to seek all remedies available to it under law as a result of these infringing activities. If the infringing material is not removed immediately, we shall be forced to take further legal action. Sincerely, Stacy L. Papachristos Associate Counsel - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF WWE, INC.'S RIGHTS AND AGREEMENT TO CEASE INFRINGEMENT I, _______________________, the registrant of the www.wrestlenewz.com website, agree to fully discontinue infringing use of WWE, Inc.'s copyrighted works, and agree not to make such infringing use in the future. I also hereby agree to comply immediately with the demands set forth above. I further agree that this Agreement shall be binding upon my respective controlled subsidiaries, affiliates, successors, and assigns. ___________________________________ Sincerely, Stacy L. Papachristos Associate Counsel World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc Telephone: 203-353-5073 Facsimile: 203-353-0236 E-mail: stacy.papachristos@wwecorp.com CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email has been sent by World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s legal department. It is intended solely for the person(s) or organizations(s) named above (or their authorized representative) , and may contain information which is confidential and/or legally privileged. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of this transmission. The unauthorized use, copying, distribution, or disclosure of this email or any of its content is unauthorized and may be unlawful. Thank you. -----Original Message----- From: Papachristos, Stacy Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 11:02 AM To: 'Copyright' Subject: RE: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4365184L] re: Urgent! Notice of Infringement Sincerely, Stacy L. Papachristos Associate Counsel World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc Telephone: 203-353-5073 Facsimile: 203-353-0236 E-mail: stacy.papachristos@wwecorp.com CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email has been sent by World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s legal department. It is intended solely for the person(s) or organizations(s) named above (or their authorized representative) , and may contain information which is confidential and/or legally privileged. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of this transmission. The unauthorized use, copying, distribution, or disclosure of this email or any of its content is unauthorized and may be unlawful. Thank you. -----Original Message----- From: Copyright [mailto:copyright@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 11:00 AM To: Papachristos, Stacy Subject: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4365184L] re: Urgent! Notice of Infringement Please re-send the below-pasted complaint since there is no attachment. Sorry for the inconvenience. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Friday, June 01, 2007 9:41 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4365184L] re: Urgent! Notice of Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. re: Urgent! Stacy L. Papachristos

                                                                                           Associate Counsel

       ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;          Telephone: 203-353-5073

                                                                                       Fax: 203-353-0236

       ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;          E-mail: Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com

 

 

June 1, 2007

 

                          By Email

 

Re:    &nb sp; Unauthorized Use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc. Intellectual Property

                                      

To Whom It May Concern:

 

World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc., and its subsidiaries WWE Libraries, Inc. and WCW, Inc. (collectively referred to as “WWE”) are the exclusive owners of numerous trademarks, service marks, and copyrights, including numerous copyrights for various WWE, WCW, CSW, WCCW, OVW, CWF, ECW, AWA American Wrestling Association, NWA, and Smoky Mountain video footage (hereinafter collectively referred to as “WWE Footage”).  As owner of numerous copyrights for WWE Footage, we vigilantly protect our copyrighted works and will not tolerate any infringement of the same.

 

Since your company is listed as the hosting company of the www.wrestlenewz.com website, we are writing to inform you that you are infringing upon WWE copyrights.  As such, we demand that you immediately cease and desist from using this website to directly or indirectly cause, enable, induce, contribute to, encourage, facilitate, and/or participate in the infringement of WWE copyrighted works.  In particular, we demand that you immediately stop distributing, posting and/or streaming WWE Footage/images, and all activities that contribute to the infringement of WWE intellectual property, including but not limited to providing links to material that you know is infringing, on your www.wrestlenewz.com website.  For your reference, attached is a sampling of WWE copyrighted works that are being infringed.  Please note that this is only a sampling of WWE material that is being infringed and is not intended to suggest that the identified infringements are the only ones occurring.  ALL WWE Footage and copyrighted images must be removed from the www.wrestlenewz.com website and any links to content which is infringing must be removed from your www.wrestlenewz.com website immediately.  Otherwise we will be forced to take further legal action. 

     

 

The demands made herein are not made to the exclusion of other remedies to which WWE is entitled and WWE specifically reserves the right to seek all remedies available to it under law as a result of these infringing activities.   

 

If the infringing material is not removed immediately, we shall be forced to take further legal action.

          &nbs p;

         ;             ;             ;             ;             ;    Sincerely,

 

          &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p; Stacy L. Papachristos

          &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p; Associate Counsel

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF WWE, INC.’S RIGHTS

AND AGREEMENT TO CEASE INFRINGEMENT

 

I, _______________________, the registrant of the www.wrestlenewz.com website, agree to fully discontinue infringing use of WWE, Inc.’s copyrighted works, and agree not to make such infringing use in the future.   I also hereby agree to comply immediately with the demands set forth above.  I further agree that this Agreement shall be binding upon my respective controlled subsidiaries, affiliates, successors, and assigns.

         ;             ;
